title: Best of The Program | Guests: Tammy Bruce & Ken Paxton | 2/19/21
description:
Stu’s house flooded after a pipe burst during the winter storm. Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton joins to discuss an investigation into ERCOT’s questionable handling of the power grid. Radio host Tammy Bruce joins with the story of how Rush Limbaugh helped her go from president of the Los Angeles chapter of the National Organization of Women to an independent conservative.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
